Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits advertisements for electronic cigarettes, vapor products and tobacco products within five hundred feet of a school or park
Summary: Prohibits advertisements for electronic cigarettes, vapor products and tobacco products within five hundred feet of a school or park.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prohibiting advertisements for electronic cigarettes, vapor products and tobacco products within five hundred feet of a school or park
